googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: mcb
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Nice young man came and just robbed me of $119 and change.  Be very careful using these guys.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: MCB, we are concerned by your review and would like to clarify that it was Triple B Plumbing from Decatur Alabama that did your work. We don’t have any young men in our employment nor would we charge an amount that requires change. We strive to provide the best service possible and would like to discuss this further. Please reach out to us at Russell@triplebplumbing.net
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Triple B Plumbing, LLC.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Felicia Terry
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Wonderful crew. Got the job done quick and didn’t break the bank! Thanks guys
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Triple B Plumbing, LLC.

aboutUs: At Triple B Plumbing, LLC, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbing professionals dedicated to providing top-notch services to the residents of Decatur and surrounding areas. Our expertise spans a wide range of plumbing solutions, from residential repairs and installations to commercial projects. We specialize in drain cleaning, water heater replacements, and comprehensive plumbing system maintenance, ensuring your home or business runs smoothly.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing company committed to delivering exceptional service and lasting solutions.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured technicians with extensive training and expertise in the latest plumbing techniques and technologies.
Prompt and reliable service, with a commitment to arriving on time and completing projects efficiently without compromising quality.
Transparent pricing and upfront cost estimates, ensuring you know exactly what to expect before any work begins.
